title.narrative: Centre of Expertise in Education and Development at EDUFI

description.narrative: The Centre of Expertise in Education and Development at the Finnish National Agency for Education pools Finnish capacity and expertise in education and development; facilitates deployment of education-sector expertise for the use of developing countries an d multilateral actors; and supports partner countries? efforts in offering equitable and inclusive quality education with a focus on systemic and policy-level education-sector development in areas like teacher training curriculum development in primary and secondary education evaluation and digital learning. Its main functions are: 1) Enhancing capacity and expertise in education and development;2) Facilitating deployment of education experts in bilateral and multilateral development cooperation; and 3) Str engthening development policy in education multi-stakeholder cooperation communication and advocacy. The long-term goal/result of the Centre's activities is that the preconditions for the development of inclusive and high-quality education in the partner c ountries and multilateral actors in the education sector have been strengthened. A Steering Group that includes representatives of the MFA the Ministry of Education and Culture and EDUFI is responsible for the strategic guidance and development of the Cent re.
